pull.title: [QT] cleanup icons
pull.body:
- Cleanup SVG code
- Unify design ("Typicons" seems to have round edges)
- Replace wifi icon with something new

events.body:
@jonasschnelli Could you check if `clock5.png` displays correctly?

Edit: Fixed, see commit.

Nice! Thanks.
Will test and post some screenshots soon.
Where did the "something new" network icon come from? What is its license? This needs to be updated in assets-attribution.md, and must be MIT or similar licensing terms.

In general it looks very good. The new net icons (instead of the "wifi" like icon) has a bit thin lines... Please update the `assets-attribution.md`. At least add yourself to the list of designers (https://github.com/MarcoFalke/bitcoin/blob/MarcoFalke-2015-icon-cleanup/doc/assets-attribution.md#jonas-schnelli) so it would be clear that you are publishing under the MIT license. OSX: LINUX:
I'm not a friend of the new connection symbols, that is a NACK on changing it that way.

@Diapolo: could you give us any objective reasons for your dislike? The current icon is mostly used for WiFi connections and therefore i think changing it makes sense. The new icons would more reflect a p2p "signal strength".
I will try to make the wires thicker and make another commit of the new p2p-connection symbol, so it is easier not to merge it.
@jonasschnelli It reminds me of an USB-like symbol, a USB hub or something. Perhaps we should only use a color indicator red, orange, yellow and green (only if incoming connections are allowed).

I like the new connection icon. Inventive.

NACK on using a color indicator. We've switched to single-color icons, let's stick to it.

events.message:
[QT] cleanup icons

* Cleanup SVG code
* Unify design ("Typicons" seem to have round edges)
* Fix transparency issue with clock5.png
[Qt] replace wifi icon with network symbol

events.body:
I did the split into two commits, so we have:
- First commit:

![screenshot from 2015-08-04 12-29-13](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/6399679/9063124/56ac30c6-3ac6-11e5-8a57-8eacd2e2b26a.png)
- Second commit (thicker wires):

![screenshot from 2015-08-04 16-14-19](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/6399679/9063181/934ede2a-3ac6-11e5-99da-989170c10d2d.png)

Post merge ACK. I did have some screens to post but will leave it now.
